Interface Command<T extends Command<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - the implementing type
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCommand, JarCommand, JavacCommand, JavadocCommand, JavapCommand, JDepsCommand, JLinkCommand, JModCommand, JPackageCommand, JUnitCommand
public interface Command<T extends Command<T>>
An aggregator of command-line arguments.
